All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bet
    Bet is a class that extends the Type class, it adds a new variable named betPoints and is used to change the points correctly for this type of game.
    Game
    This class stores the list with the players, the questions and controls the whole game.
    HighScore  
    Player
    This class represents a player and it stores his nickname,the score and the status.
    Questions
    Class Questions contains a question, the answers for the question and the right answer.
    QuickAnswer  
    ReadQuestionsFile  
    RightAnswer
    This class extends Type and adds 1000 points to every player that answers correctly.
    Round
    Class Round symbolizes a round of the game, which consists of a number of questions.
    Thermometer  
    StopTheTimer  
    Type
    This class is the parent of the game types that are available.
    UserInteraction
    This class contains all the interactions with the user, asks all the questions, prints all the messages and collects the data that we need from the users.
